edu.iu.dsc.tws.examples.batch.kmeans

Class KMeansUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iu.dsc.tws.examples.batch.kmeans.KMeansUtils

  • public final class KMeansUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has the utility methods to generate the datapoints and centroids. Also, it has the methods to parse the data partitions and data objects and store into the double arrays.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double[][] findNearestCenter(int dim, double[][] datapoints, double[][] centers)
      This method first invoke the euclidean distance between to calculate the distance between the data points assigned to the task (i.e from start index to end index) and the centroid values.
      static void generateDataPoints(Config config, int dim, int numFiles, int datasize, int centroidsize, java.lang.String dinputDirectory, java.lang.String cinputDirectory)
      This method is to generate the datapoints and centroids based on the user submitted values.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • findNearestCenter

        public static double[][] findNearestCenter(int dim,
                                           double[][] datapoints,
                                           double[][] centers)
        This method first invoke the euclidean distance between to calculate the distance between the data points assigned to the task (i.e from start index to end index) and the centroid values. The calculated centroid values and the number of data points closer to the particular centroid values assigned to the centerSums array object.
